Well said!"},{"lineNumber":76299,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それでこそ心の友！」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's the true heart of a friend!\""},{"lineNumber":76300,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ビスケッタさん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Biscetta-san!\""},{"lineNumber":76301,"originalJapaneseLine":"「失った血液を補給する為の食事ですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is a meal to replenish the lost blood."},{"lineNumber":76302,"originalJapaneseLine":"　既にご用意いたしました。","translatedEnglishLine":"It has already been prepared."},{"lineNumber":76303,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今から運びますので……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will bring it to you shortly...\""},{"lineNumber":76304,"originalJapaneseLine":"「時間の無駄だ。こっちから行く」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's a waste of time. I'll go from here.\""},{"lineNumber":76305,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おいカオス、お前直るな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey Chaos, are you going to translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As you can see, both of us...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぼろぼろにやられたしのう……」
「こんだけケチョンケチョンにされて退けるか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After being beaten this badly, you think I'll back down?"
"It's decided — until one of us dies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺し合うに決まってんだろうが！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the true heart of a friend!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「失った血液を補給する為の食事ですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is a meal to replenish the lost blood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既にご用意いたしました。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will bring it to you shortly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時間の無駄だ。こっちから行く」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a waste of time. I'll go from here."
"Hey Chaos, are you going to heal?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、アニキ、これ直るのかい？」
「そいつ変態だから女に不埒なことすれば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He's a pervert, so if you do something improper with a woman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様は今から体を治す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm going to heal my body now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前もそれまでに直っとけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You better be healed by then too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 退室するランスを見送ると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After seeing Rance leave the room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスはその場にいる女性陣に振り返った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos turned to the women present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆には儂の体を直す為に強力してもらうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will have everyone cooperate to heal my body."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エクスタシーエネルギーで直る。
以前それで折られた刀身を直したことがある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've even fixed a broken blade with it before."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「エクスタシーエネルギーってのは、
要はエロエロ〜んな波動？　みたいな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: basically an erotic... wave? Something like that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、冗談に聞こえるでしょうけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, it sounds like a joke, but
this is really a serious story."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そんな話、初めて聞きました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's the first time I've heard such a thing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当なんだからしょうがないでしょ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's true, so it can't be helped!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 問題は相手、なんじゃが……」
「んじゃ、自分の体でも使うっすか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, should I use my own body?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
